forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of light rain this morning. High 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Periods of light rain this morning. High 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 4C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low around 40F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 37F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 37F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening. A shower or two late - otherwise, mostly cloudy. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers later on. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
